snippet: The show of support will be the first international trip for Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, who routinely declines to leave New York, even when on vacation.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo and leaders of State Legislature say they will make 'unity trip' to Israel in effort to show support for country amid fighting in Gaza.

byline.original: By THOMAS KAPLAN and SUSANNE CRAIG

lead_paragraph: The show of support will be the first international trip for Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, who routinely declines to leave New York, even when on vacation.

headline.main: Cuomo Will Visit Israel With Legislative Leaders
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Will Visit Israel With Legislative Leaders
